name: Terminal Disease
description:
A simulation of a zombie outbreak involving a single zombie, 30+ NPCs, and you; our spade wielding protagonist.

Can you stop the zombie apocalypse before it consumes the entire population of your tiny terminal room? Use your shovel to bash zombie heads in before they infect and spread the terrible terminal disease!

Controls:

WASD Keys: Move

Arrow Keys: Attack in that direction with your spade.

Note: You may change the "size" of the game characters by adjusting your terminal/console font
